content.text:
# Ishwar Dayal Mishra

Ishwar Dayal Mishra () is a Nepalese politician, a member of People's Progressive Party and the general secretary of the party. He was born in 1972 in Kapilvastu Kushahwa, Maharajganj.
In the 2008 Constituent Assembly election he was elected to represent Kapilvastu 4 receiving 10,394 votes.[https://www.election.gov.np Election Commission of Nepal]
